remarks: The uniform structure generated by metric ` D ` is a uniform structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: metuustOLD $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( metUnifOLD ` D ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) $.
